VIII.iv.3.B.1.b
.
Determining Whether IU is an Issue in a Claim
While a substantially complete
VA Form 21-8940, Veteranâ€™s Application for Increased Compensation Based on Unemployability
, is necessary to provide VA with information needed to substantiate entitlement to IU, it is not necessary to raise the issue of IU.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B - Individual Unemployability (IU) Claims Development
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B
